full_text:
FEES FOR GENERAL PLAN CONSISTENCY.
	(Amended by Ord. No. 181,790, Eff. 8/18/11.)

	The following fees shall be charged when a zone change is requested by an applicant that necessitates the initiation of a General Plan Amendment to achieve consistency between the requested zone change and the General Plan:

[FILING FEE]


  
    
      
        Type of Application
      
      
        Fee*
      
    
    
      
        Zone Change and associated costs for a General Plan Amendment for less than 400 dwelling units, 500,000 square feet for commercial/industrial, or 250,000 square feet for mixed use
(Section 11.5.6)
      
      
        $23,884
      
    
    
      
        Zone Change and associated costs for a General Plan Amendment for 400 dwelling units or greater, 500,000 square feet or greater for commercial/industrial, or 250,000 square feet or greater for mixed use
(Section 11.5.6)
      
      
        $32,116
      
    
    
      
        Annexation, Zone Change and associated costs for a General Plan Amendment less than 400 dwelling units, 500,000 square feet for commercial/industrial, or 250,000 square feet for mixed use
(Section 11.5.6)
      
      
        $46,357
      
    
    
      
        Annexation, Zone Change and associated costs for a General Plan Amendment for 400 dwelling units or greater, 500,000 square feet or greater for commercial/ industrial, or 250,000 square feet or greater for mixed use
(Section 11.5.6)
      
      
        $62,566
      
    
  


* See Section 19.01 V. for multiple applications.

2.catch_line: Filing Fees - Division Of Land And Private Street Maps And Appeals.

4.catch_line: Filing Fee - Plans And Conditions Of Approval.

6.catch_line: Filing Fees For Coastal Development Permits.

7.catch_line: Fees For Flood Hazard Reports And Compliance Checks.

9.catch_line: Land Development Counseling – Fee For Second And Subsequent Sessions.

11.catch_line: Annual Inspection Of Compliance With Far Averaging Covenant.

13.catch_line: Surcharge For Automated Systems For The Department Of City Planning.

14.catch_line: Fees For Enforcement Of Housing Covenants.

15.catch_line: Department Of Transportation Traffic Study Review, Condition Clearance And Permit Issuance Fees.

16.catch_line: General Plan Maintenance Surcharge For The Department Of City Planning.

plain_text:
LOS ANGELES MUNICIPAL CODE

FEES FOR GENERAL PLAN CONSISTENCY. (§ 19.03)

  FEES FOR GENERAL PLAN CONSISTENCY.
	(Amended by Ord. No. 181,790, Eff. 8/18/11.)	The following fees shall be
charged when a zone change is requested by an applicant that necessitates the
initiation of a General Plan Amendment to achieve consistency between the
requested zone change and the General Plan:[FILING FEE]
  
    
      
        Type of Application
      
      
        Fee*
      
    
    
      
        Zone Change and associated costs for a General Plan Amendment for less
than 400 dwelling units, 500,000 square feet for commercial/industrial, or
250,000 square feet for mixed use
(Section 11.5.6)
      
      
        $23,884
      
    
    
      
        Zone Change and associated costs for a General Plan Amendment for 400
dwelling units or greater, 500,000 square feet or greater for
commercial/industrial, or 250,000 square feet or greater for mixed use
(Section 11.5.6)
      
      
        $32,116
      
    
    
      
        Annexation, Zone Change and associated costs for a General Plan
Amendment less than 400 dwelling units, 500,000 square feet for
commercial/industrial, or 250,000 square feet for mixed use
(Section 11.5.6)
      
      
        $46,357
      
    
    
      
        Annexation, Zone Change and associated costs for a General Plan
Amendment for 400 dwelling units or greater, 500,000 square feet or greater for
commercial/ industrial, or 250,000 square feet or greater for mixed use
(Section 11.5.6)
      
      
        $62,566
      
    
  
* See Section 19.01 V. for multiple applications.

FEES FOR GENERAL PLAN CONSISTENCY. (Amended by Ord. No. 181,790, Eff. 8/18/11.)

The following fees shall be charged when a zone change is requested by an applicant that necessitates the initiation of a General Plan Amendment to achieve consistency between the requested zone change and the General Plan:

[FILING FEE]

Type of Application Fee* Zone Change and associated costs for a General Plan Amendment for less than 400 dwelling units, 500,000 square feet for commercial/industrial, or 250,000 square feet for mixed use (Section 11.5.6) $23,884 Zone Change and associated costs for a General Plan Amendment for 400 dwelling units or greater, 500,000 square feet or greater for commercial/industrial, or 250,000 square feet or greater for mixed use (Section 11.5.6) $32,116 Annexation, Zone Change and associated costs for a General Plan Amendment less than 400 dwelling units, 500,000 square feet for commercial/industrial, or 250,000 square feet for mixed use (Section 11.5.6) $46,357 Annexation, Zone Change and associated costs for a General Plan Amendment for 400 dwelling units or greater, 500,000 square feet or greater for commercial/ industrial, or 250,000 square feet or greater for mixed use (Section 11.5.6) $62,566

* See Section 19.01 V. for multiple applications.
